content: to top of 1st treble_crochet 18 3 1 chain turn 1 double_crochet in same st 2 double_crochet in each st around ending with 1 double_crochet in last st join with slip_stitch to 1st double_crochet 36 4 3 chain 1 5tr bobble in next st *skip next st 1 treble_crochet in next st 1 5tr bobble in next st* around ending with bobble join with slip_stitch to top of 3 chain 36 5 1 chain turn 1 double_crochet in same st *2 double_crochet s in next st 1 double_crochet in next st* around to end slip_stitch to 1st double_crochet 54 6 3 chain turn 1 5tr bobble in next st *skip next st 1 treble_crochet in next st 1 5tr bobble in next st* around ending with bobble slip_stitch to top of 3 chain 54 7 1 chain turn 1 double_crochet in same st 1 double_crochet in next st and in each st around slip_stitch to 1st double_crochet 54 8 1 chain turn skip next st 1 treble_crochet in next st *1 5tr bobble in next st skip next st 1 treble_crochet in next st* around ending with bobble st slip_stitch to top of 1 chain 54 9 1 chain turn 1 double_crochet in same st and in each st around slip_stitch to 1st double_crochet 54 10 1 chain turn skip next st 1 treble_crochet in next st *5tr bobble in next st skip next st 1 treble_crochet in next st* around ending with bobble st slip_stitch to top of 1 chain 54 11 1 chain turn 1 double_crochet in next st and in each st around continue to end slip_stitch to 1st double_crochet 54 12 1 chain turn skip next st *1 treble_crochet in next st 5tr in bobble in next st skip next st* around ending with bobble st slip_stitch to top of 1st treble_crochet 54 13 1 chain double_crochet in next st 1 double_crochet in each st around slip_stitch to 1st double_crochet 54 14 1 chain turn skip next st treble_crochet in next st 5tr bobble in next st skip next st treble_crochet in next st around ending with bobble st slip_stitch to top of 3 chain 54 15 1 chain double_crochet in next st 1 double_crochet in each st to end 54 16 1 chain turn skip next st *treble_crochet in next st 5tr bobble in next st skip next st* around ending with bobble st 54 17 1 chain turn double_crochet in same st 1 double_crochet in next 4 st 1 treble_crochet in next 12 st 1 double_crochet in next 20 st 1 treble_crochet in next 12 st 1 double_crochet in next 5 st slip_stitch to 1st double_crochet 54 18-19 repeat row 17 two times more without turning at the end of the row 54 20 1 chain double_crochet in same st and in each around slip_stitch to 1st double_crochet finish off and weave in ends copyright designs byzula 2010 www byzula com i have no problem with
